column5: Usually do them myself but not this year, any recommendations for a good tax guy in the Barrie area ? Thanks Ryan
Have you considered doing them online...I use Tax Chopper...Tax Chopper.ca  I find it very easy to use.

I have a phenomenal tax guy you can use however he doesn't live in Barrie. He did the taxes for my father's global business and now does them for my girlfriend and I. You would have to mail him your stuff as he resides around Windsor Ontario but he is very good. I am in full commission sales so I need a good tax guy and I would recommend him to anyone! PM me if your interested, I too live in Barrie but would rather mail to this guy then find someone closer.
